long_description: The Edelrid Ibex 10mm x 60m non-dry rope offers great handling and durability at an excellent value. Whether you're a beginner climber or a seasoned pro, the Ibex is an excellent choice. Thermo Shield treatment employs a heat process to stabilize individual yarns, ensuring the rope stays supple throughout its working lifetime. Kernmantle design features a stretchy core protected by a durable outer sheath which combine for strength and good handling. 10mm diameter stands up to regular use, yet keeps the rope light enough for hiking it in to the crag. The Edelrid Ibex 10mm x 60m non-dry rope meets UIAA tests for falls, impact force and elongation.
short_description: The Edelrid Ibex 10mm x 60m non-dry rope offers great handling and durability at an excellent value. Whether you're a beginner climber or a seasoned pro, the Ibex is an excellent choice.
